explains: adj. 不正当的；不讲道理的；不合法的

sentences.en: She decided to sue her employer for wrongful dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她决定起诉雇主非法解雇她。

sentences.en: He is on hunger strike in protest at what he claims is his wrongful conviction for murder.
sentences.cn: 他正绝食抗议，声称对他谋杀罪的判决不公正。

sentences.en: It would also help prevent wrongful convictions.
sentences.cn: 同时，这也会防止错误判决。
